article: One day a wise man was walking along the beach when he saw a young man far away picking up something and very gently throwing it into the sea. As he got (  _  ) he called out to the young man, "Good morning! What are you doing?" The young man (  _  ), looked up and replied, "Throwing starfishes into the sea." "Why are you throwing starfishes into the sea?" "The sun is up and the (  _  ) is going away. And if I don't throw them in they'll (  _  )." "But, young man, don't you (  _  ) that there are miles and miles of beach and starfishes all along it. You can't (  _  ) make a difference!" The young man (  _  ) politely. Then he picked another starfish and threw it into the sea, and said, "It made a difference for that (  _  )." There is something very (  _  ) in each and every one of us. We have all been given the ability to make a difference to shape the future. We must each find our own starfish. And if we throw our starfish wisely and well, the (  _  ) will be better.
